item.description:
Hey guys, Germany's Booka Shade is coming to the Middle East Downstairs on the 29th. They're definitely different from Tiesto and Oakenfold, but I've really liked the tracks of theirs that I've heard.

At Rob's suggestion, let's meet at the Enourmous Room for drinks beforehand, then head over to the show. I'll plan to be there around 7 with a glow stick to make me easy to spot.

Doors open at 8 PM. You can get tickets in person at the Middle East box office from 1-7 PM, or through ticketmaster. Prices are $14 in advance and $16 at the door. Hope you guys can make it!

Cheers,

Eric
item.name: Booka Shade at the Middle East
